"I would like to express my sincere gratitude and appreciation to commissioner Roger Goodell for allowing me to be readmitted to the National Football League," Michael Vick said in a statement released by his agent, Joel Segal. I fully understand that playing football in the NFL is a privilege, not a right, and I am truly thankful for the opportunity I have been given.
